private static void sendKNX(RoutingContext routingContext) {
  String realAddr = routingContext.request().getParam("realAddr");
  String value = routingContext.request().getParam("value");
  String length = routingContext.request().getParam("length");
  EventBus eb = routingContext.vertx().eventBus();
  JsonObject jsonObject = new JsonObject();
  jsonObject.put("realAddr", realAddr);
  jsonObject.put("value", value);
  jsonObject.put("length", Integer.valueOf(length));
  eb.send("ntesec.controller.executor.writeRealAddrKNX", jsonObject);
}

private static void getDeviceStatus(RoutingContext routingContext) {

  log.info("æ”¶åˆ°æŸ¥è¯¢è®¾å¤‡å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€è¯·æ±‚ï¼šdeviceIds=ã€‹" + deviceIds);
  Vertx vertx = routingContext.vertx();

  if (StringUtil.isNullOrEmpty(deviceIds)) {
    log.info("è¿”å›å½“å‰æ‰€æœ‰è®¾å¤‡çŠ¶æ€" + GlobalData.statusMap);
    
    RespUtil.writeJsonLmx("success", "", GlobalData.statusMap, routingContext);
  } else {
    String[] ids = deviceIds.split(",");

s = requests.Session()
s.headers['User-Agent'] = 'okhttp/3.10.0'

# è·å–æ‰€æœ‰é¢‘é“ä¿¡æ¯
all_channels_response = s.get("http://120.87.12.38:8083/epg/api/custom/getAllChannel.json")
all_channels_data = all_channels_response.json()

if all_channels_data['status'] != '200' or 'channels' not in all_channels_data:
    print("é”™è¯¯ï¼šæ— æ³•è·å–é¢‘é“åˆ—è¡¨æˆ–é¢‘é“åˆ—è¡¨æ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯ã€‚")

# æå–é¢‘é“ä»£ç 
channel_codes = [channel['params']['hwcode'] for channel in all_channels_data['channels'] if 'params' in channel and 'hwcode' in channel['params']]

# è·å–è®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œ
token_response = s.get("è¿™é‡Œæ›¿æ¢é‰´æƒURLï¼Œå¯èƒ½IPåœ°å€ä¸åŒï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿åŒæ—¶ä¿®æ”¹ä¸‹é¢çš„IP")
access_token = token_response.json().get('access_token')

if not access_token:

# ä½¿ç”¨è®¿é—®ä»¤ç‰Œè¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®
headers = {

}

# ä¿å­˜å“åº”æ•°æ®åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶

# è¯»å– iptv.json å¹¶å¤„ç†æ•°æ®
with open('iptv.json', 'r',encoding='UTF-8') as f:

        if "CCTV" in channel_name or "CGTN" in channel_name:

        elif any(x in channel_name for x in ["å¹¿ä¸œ", "å¹¿å·", "å¤§æ¹¾åŒº", "å—æ–¹", "å²­å—"]):
            group = "å¹¿ä¸œ"
        elif "å«è§†" in channel_name:
            group = "å«è§†"

        if group:

            channels[group].append(f"{channel_name},{timeshift_url}")

    # å†™å…¥å¤„ç†åçš„æ•°æ®åˆ° iptv.txt
    with open('iptv.txt', 'a',encoding='UTF-8') as f:

#!/bin/bash
wininfo=$(cat ~/.config/microsoft-edge/Default/Preferences)
top=$(jq -r .browser.window_placement.top <<< "$wininfo")
bottom=$(jq -r .browser.window_placement.bottom <<< "$wininfo")
left=$(jq -r .browser.window_placement.left <<< "$wininfo")
right=$(jq -r .browser.window_placement.right <<< "$wininfo")
#echo $top,$bottom,$left,$right
if [[ ! $top -le 0 ]]; then
  top=$((top*2))
else
  top=$((top/2))
fi
if [[ ! $left -le 0 ]]; then
  left=$((left*2))
else
  left=$((left/2))
fi
cat ~/.config/microsoft-edge/Default/Preferences | jq '.browser.window_placement.top='$top' | .browser.window_placement.left='$left' | .browser.window_placement.right='$((right*2))' | .browser.window_placement.bottom='$((bottom/100*199)) > ~/.config/microsoft-edge/Default/PreferencesGen
mv  ~/.config/microsoft-edge/Default/PreferencesGen  ~/.config/microsoft-edge/Default/Preferences
